about_the_game:
Includes the following items:
- Star Herb x 10 (Restores a little SP. A small herb which blooms only at night. Its syrup is highly prized.)
- Mystic Honey x 5 (Restores moderate SP. It is gathered from a rare flower whose petals attract elementals.)
- Sea Ointment x 3 (Restores a little HP. A potent salve gathered from the dust of the elementals.)
